text: and say unto the people of the land, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah concerning the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and the land of Israel: They shall eat their bread with fearfulness, and drink their water in dismay, that her land may be desolate, <FI>and despoiled<Fi> of all that is therein, because of the violence of all them that dwell therein.
name: Ezekiel 12:19
